API¶

For use by developers to build applications on top of Nokia Tangaza

tangaza.Tangaza.api.get_admins(*args)¶
Returns:
The list of admins in the group
Args:
group - the group whose administrators are being requested for
tangaza.Tangaza.api.get_groups(*args)¶
Returns:
All groups that the user is a member of
Args:
member - the member making the request
tangaza.Tangaza.api.get_members(*args)¶
Returns:
All members in the a particular group
Args:
member- the member making the request, group - the group whose members are being requested for
tangaza.Tangaza.api.get_messages(*args)¶
Returns:
The list of messages that member has received
Args:
member - the member making the request
tangaza.Tangaza.api.get_update(*args)¶
Returns:
Your current status i.e. groups you are a member of, info on unheard messages, pending invites
Args:
member - the member requesting this info
tangaza.Tangaza.api.json_repr(queryset, fields=None)¶
Django serializer doesnt display items in custom querysets e.g. if you use Model.objects.extra(select=[‘field’]...) This is a custom serializer that enables this
tangaza.Tangaza.api.request_add_admin(*args)¶
Returns:
status - 0 if admin was successfully added, -1 if it failed; message - error or success message
Args:
member - the member (must be an administrator) who wants to add new administrator to the group group - the group to which the new administrator is being added new_admin - the new administrator being added to the group
tangaza.Tangaza.api.request_create_group(*args)¶
Returns:
status - 0 if group created, -1 if it failed; message - error or success message
Args:
member - the member who wants to create a group group_name - the name of the group to be created
tangaza.Tangaza.api.request_delete_admin(*args)¶
Returns:
status - 0 if the admin was successfully deleted, -1 if it failed; message - error or success message
Args:
member - the member (must be an administrator) who wants to delete an administrator from the group group - the group from which the administrator is being deleted del_admin - the administrator that is being deleted from the group
tangaza.Tangaza.api.request_delete_group(*args)¶
Returns:
status - 0 if group deleted, -1 if it failed; message - error or success message
Args:
member - the member deleting a group group - the id of group being deleted
tangaza.Tangaza.api.request_delete_user(*args)¶
Returns:
status - 0 if the member was successfully deleted, -1 if it failed; message - error or success message
Args:
member - the member (must be an administrator) who wants to delete a member from the group group - the group from which the member is being deleted del_user - the member being deleted from the group
tangaza.Tangaza.api.request_invite_user(*args)¶
Returns:
status - 0 if invite was sent, -1 if it failed; message - error or success message
Args:
member - the member sending the invite group - the group the person is being invited to invited_user_phone - the phone number of the person being invited
tangaza.Tangaza.api.request_join(*args)¶
Returns:
status - 0 if successfully joined, -1 if it failed; message - error or success message
Args:
member - the member trying to join a group group - the group that the member wants to join
tangaza.Tangaza.api.request_leave(*args)¶
Returns:
status - 0 if successfully left group, -1 if it failed; message - error or success message
Args:
member - the member who is leaving the group group - the group that the member is leaving
tangaza.Tangaza.api.request_quiet(*args)¶
Returns:
status - 0 if successfully set group to quiet, -1 if failed; message - error or success message
Args:
member - the who doesnt want to receive updates from the group group - the group that the member wants to put on silent mode
tangaza.Tangaza.api.request_unquiet(*args)¶
Returns:
status - 0 if successfully set group to send updates, -1 if failed; message - error or success message
Args:
member - the member who wants to receive the updates group - the group that the member wants to receive updates from
tangaza.Tangaza.api.set_username(*args)¶
Returns:
status - 0 if a new username was set, -1 if it failed; message - error or success message
Args:
member - the member who wants to change their username username - a new username for the member

Model Layer
